snippet: The 86-year-old founder of the world’s largest gold mining company will step down amid criticism from shareholders over several missteps in a tough market.
lead_paragraph: The 86-year-old founder of the world’s largest gold mining company will step down amid criticism from shareholders over several missteps in a tough market.

headline.main: Chairman of Barrick Gold Plans to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Chairman of Barrick Gold Plans to Step Down
